semantics.label: translate:: Player mode
semantics.description: translate:: Select the layout of the player.

semantics.label: translate:: Enable controls
semantics.description: translate:: Controls allow the user to for instance pause the audio

semantics.label: translate:: Enable autoplay
semantics.description: translate:: With autoplay the audio starts to play immediately. If autoplay is disabled the user presses a play button to start the audio.

semantics.label: translate:: Audio not supported message
semantics.default: translate:: Your browser does not support this audio
